UnlinkedWikibaseBaseUrl.description: The base URL of the Wikibase site to use.

UnlinkedWikibaseEntityTTL.description: The cache lifetime (in seconds) for individual entities. Set to null when the UnlinkedWikibaseUpdateEntities script is used to update the data.

UnlinkedWikibaseQueryTTL.description: The cache lifetime (in seconds) for Sparql queries.

UnlinkedWikibaseStatementsParserFunc.description: DEPRECATED: Use UnlinkedWikibaseImitationMode instead. Whether to enable the {{#statements:}} parser function.

UnlinkedWikibaseImitationMode.description: Whether to expose the Lua library as mw.wikibase.*, and enable {{#statements:}} and {{#property:}} parser functions.

UnlinkedWikibaseSitelinkSuffix.description: What sitelink suffix to turn into language links (e.g. 'wiki') or false to disable using language links

UnlinkedWikibaseSitelinkSkippedLangs.description: List of language codes to skip
